PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: ACTIMALT LIQUID REGULAR is a viscous yellow-brown syrup produced by Muntons through an enzyme-assisted hot water extraction of barley and malted barley, followed by filtration and concentration under vacuum evaporation. This sweet barley and malt extract has a characteristic cereal and malt flavor and a pleasant aroma, making it ideal for enhancing the taste profile of various food and beverage products. Composed primarily of soluble extracts of barley and malted barley (typically 77.1 - 79.6%) and water (20.4 - 22.9%), it contains fermentable sugars such as maltose and maltotriose, which support fermentation processes in brewing and baking. ACTIMALT LIQUID REGULAR also contributes to color development and moisture retention in baked goods, improving texture and shelf life. Nutritionally, it provides essential vitamins, minerals, and dietary fiber, with a typical energy value of 300-320 kcal per 100g. The product is suitable for a wide range of dietary requirements, being gluten-containing but compliant with kosher, halal, and non-GMO standards. Its multifunctional properties make it a valuable ingredient for flavor enhancement, nutritional fortification, and functional applications in the food and beverage industry.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: FAMB279 N&A BROWN SUGAR TYPE FL from WILD Flavors, Inc. is a light brown/tan powder flavoring designed to impart a rich maple brown sugar aroma and taste to food products. Composed of ingredients such as gum arabic, maltodextrin, nature identical flavor, dextrose from genetically modified corn, silicon dioxide, propylene glycol, glycerine, caramel color from genetically modified corn, and sulfites, this flavoring offers a complex and authentic brown sugar profile. With a moisture content below 10% and granulation exceeding 90% through a #20 USS sieve, it ensures consistent quality and ease of incorporation into various formulations. The product is microbiologically controlled to meet stringent safety standards, including limits on coliform, E. coli, mold, yeast, and salmonella, making it suitable for use in food applications compliant with the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act. Its ambient storage stability and recommended shelf life of 270 days in unopened containers make it practical for industrial use. FAMB279 N&A BROWN SUGAR TYPE FL is versatile and can enhance the flavor, color, and moisture retention in bakery goods, confectionery, beverages, sauces, dressings, dairy products, savory snacks, and plant-based foods. Its ability to provide a nostalgic, caramelized sweetness and depth of flavor makes it valuable for creating appealing and consumer-friendly products across a wide range of food and beverage applications.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Acerola juice concentrate, clarified R=64-68, produced by SVZ Tomaszow Sp. z o.o., is a high-quality juice concentrate derived from sound and mature acerola fruits (Malpighia glabra L.). The product undergoes a meticulous process including selection, depectinization, filtration, concentration, and packaging to ensure purity and consistency. It features a Brix refractometer value ranging from 64.0 to 68.0, indicating a high sugar content, with a specific gravity between 1.320 and 1.349 and a pH of 2.7 to 3.5. This concentrate is characterized by its aromatic, typical acerola flavor with a sweet and acidic taste, and visually presents an orange to yellow color. Rich in vitamin C, with levels between 6000 and 8000 mg/kg, it offers potent antioxidant properties and serves as a natural preservative and acidulant. The product complies with stringent chemical and microbiological standards, including low pesticide residues and microbial counts, ensuring safety and quality. Recommended to be stored frozen with a shelf life of 24 months, this clarified acerola juice concentrate is versatile and widely used in the food and beverage industry. Its applications include enhancing nutritional value and flavor in beverages, bakery and confectionery products, dairy and frozen desserts, meat products, and nutritional supplements. Additionally, it can function as a natural food coloring agent. The concentrate's strengths lie in its natural vitamin C content, antioxidant capacity, and ability to improve product shelf life and sensory qualities, making it an excellent ingredient for manufacturers aiming to produce health-conscious and clean-label products.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Accelerzyme CPG BF is a liquid carboxypeptidase enzyme preparation produced by DSM Food Specialties B.V., derived from a selected strain of Aspergillus niger. This enzyme preparation appears green in color, with clarity ranging from clear to opalescent, and is composed primarily of glycerol (approximately 54%) and an enzyme solution (46%). It exhibits a protease activity of at least 900 CPGU/ml and is formulated within a pH range of 4.3 to 4.7. The product is kosher and halal approved, suitable for both vegans and vegetarians, and complies with stringent microbiological and heavy metal specifications, ensuring safety and quality. Accelerzyme CPG BF is specifically designed to accelerate cheese ripening by facilitating the rapid release of small peptides and amino acids, which enhances flavor development and reduces aging time. This enzymatic action also helps reduce bitterness in cheeses by mitigating the formation of bitter peptides, resulting in a more balanced and appealing taste profile. The product supports clean label initiatives, being free of benzoates and artificial preservatives, aligning with consumer demand for natural ingredients. Additionally, it improves process efficiency in cheese production, contributing to cost savings and sustainability by shortening production cycles and lowering energy consumption. Accelerzyme CPG BF is particularly effective in blue cheese production, promoting uniform mold growth and consistent flavor distribution. Overall, this enzyme preparation offers significant benefits in dairy applications, enhancing product quality, flavor, and manufacturing efficiency while meeting modern regulatory and consumer standards.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Apple juice concentrate from AUSTRIA JUICE GmbH is a high-quality concentrated liquid derived by physically removing water from freshly pressed juice of sound and ripe Malus domestica Borkh. apples. This product appears as a typical, clear, golden-yellow viscous liquid with a flavor and taste characteristic of fresh apples. It contains approximately 70 °Bx soluble solids and maintains a total acidity as malic acid between 1.8% and 2.7%, with a pH range of 3.0 to 4.2. The concentrate complies with stringent European regulations ensuring it is free from allergens, genetically modified organisms, heavy metals, mycotoxins, and pesticide residues within legal limits. Microbiologically, it exhibits low viable counts, yeasts, and molds, ensuring product safety and quality. The concentrate is versatile and widely used as a natural sweetener and flavor enhancer in beverages such as fruit juices, nectars, soft drinks, smoothies, and health drinks. It also finds applications in dairy products, frozen desserts, bakery goods, confectionery, sauces, jams, and alcoholic beverages like cider and flavored liquors. Its natural composition, rich apple flavor, and nutritional benefits, including potential antioxidant properties and vitamin content, make it an ideal ingredient for manufacturers seeking authentic, clean-label, and nutritious food and beverage solutions. The product is typically stored at 4-6 °C with a shelf life of six months and is available in packaging as agreed with customers.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: EXTER 100 - Bouillon is a savory soy-based liquid flavor enhancer produced by Exter B.V., characterized by its typical savory soy liquid profile with sweet and caramelized notes. This brown liquid bouillon delivers a rich, meaty, and salty flavor, making it an ideal ingredient for enhancing the taste of a wide range of food products. With a water content of 63% and salt content of 16%, it provides a balanced seasoning effect while contributing 85 kcal per 100 g. The product is versatile and recommended for use in salads, meatballs, soups, sauces, dressings, gravies, noodles, snacks, and ready meals, with dosage levels typically ranging from 0.5% to 2.0% by weight of the finished product. EXTER 100 - Bouillon is halal certified, kosher suitable, and vegetarian, meeting diverse dietary requirements. It offers excellent heat and shelf-life stability, ensuring consistent flavor quality over time. Packaged in 1200 kg IBC containers, it is designed for cost-effective use in industrial food manufacturing. The product is microbiologically safe, with strict limits on total plate count, yeast, molds, and absence of salmonella. Stored at ambient temperature, it has a shelf life of 24 months. EXTER 100 - Bouillon is a reliable choice for food manufacturers seeking to impart authentic, savory, and meaty flavors to their products while adhering to clean label and certification standards.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: Salads: 0.50 - 1.50 %; Meat balls: 1.00 - 2.00 %; General recommended dosage level: 0.50 - 2.00 % by weight of finished product.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: ROKOAGAR LS ORGANIC is a premium powdered gelling and stabilizing agent produced by INDUSTRIAS ROKO, S.A., composed entirely of pure refined agar, a natural polysaccharide extracted from red seaweed species such as Gelidium and Gracilaria. This free-flowing powder ranges in color from off-white to yellowish and is manufactured in compliance with current organic legislation (Regulation (EU) No 2018/848), certified by the control body COPAE. ROKOAGAR LS ORGANIC excels in forming gels independently without requiring additional substances, producing a soft gel-like texture that becomes viscous upon stirring. It offers very high water retention, which enhances product shelf-life, and exhibits low viscosity in hot solutions, facilitating processing. In milk-based systems, it provides smooth, uniform, and creamy textures, prevents fat and whey separation, improves flavor release and mouthfeel, and can serve as a fat replacer. Its versatility makes it ideal for applications in confectionery, dietetic foods, dressings, jams, pastries, and sauces, where it improves texture, spreadability, and stability. The product is free from GMOs, gluten, and animal-derived ingredients, making it suitable for various dietary needs. Recommended usage ranges from 0.2% to 1.5%, depending on the application and desired texture, with preparation involving dispersion in water and boiling under vigorous agitation until fully dissolved. ROKOAGAR LS ORGANIC must be stored in a cool, dry place between 2°C and 30°C, away from strong odors, and has a shelf life of 24 months under proper conditions.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: 0.2 - 1.5%. The optimal dosage will depend on specific application and preferred texture.
FILE_NAME: PIM000009406-Rokoagar LS ORGANIC - Food Applications Eng - E01.pdf

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: APPLE FLAVOUR NPC1917M from Matrix Flavours & Fragrances Sdn Bhd is a liquid flavoring product designed to impart the sweet and distinctive taste of Fuji apples. This colorless to yellowish liquid has a refractive index between 1.42000 and 1.44000 and a specific gravity ranging from 1.00900 to 1.02900 at 27°C. Composed primarily of propylene glycol (E1520) and nature identical flavoring substances, it is formulated through a precise blending and mixing process to ensure a homogenized and consistent product. The flavor is evaluated as standard, ensuring reliable sensory quality. APPLE FLAVOUR NPC1917M is microbiologically stable due to its significant solvent and aromatic chemical content, which inhibits microbial growth. It is suitable for use in confectionery, bakery, and beverage applications, typically at dosages between 0.1% and 0.5%, making it ideal for enhancing the flavor profile of cakes, pastries, soft drinks, and fruit juices. The product is halal certified, free from allergens and GMOs, and complies with Malaysian food safety regulations. Packaged in HDPE containers of 5, 20, or 25 kg, it has a shelf life of 24 months when stored properly in a dry, light-protected environment at 20° to 35°C. This apple flavoring offers versatility and quality for food manufacturers seeking to deliver authentic apple taste in their products.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Pre-gelatinized organic chickpeas flour from Naturis is a fine powder with a yellow to light brown color, derived from organic chickpeas sourced from Italy and Argentina and produced in Italy. This flour is pre-gelatinized, meaning it has been processed to gelatinize the starches, enhancing its solubility and thickening properties. It is rich in protein (22.3 g per 100 g) and dietary fiber (22.5 g per 100 g), making it highly suitable for dietary formulations. The product is free from gluten, allergens, GMOs, nanoparticles, and ionizing radiation treatment, ensuring a clean and natural ingredient profile. Its excellent viscosity profile, with a peak viscosity around 7,669 cP and final viscosity exceeding 11,500 cP, makes it an effective thickener for instant sauces, soups, purees, and hummus. Additionally, it supports applications in gluten-free and plant-based products, bakery goods, extruded snacks, and dairy alternatives, contributing to improved texture, moisture retention, and nutritional enhancement. Certified organic and compliant with multiple EC and Italian regulations, this flour is packaged in 25 kg multi-ply kraft paper bags with valve, ensuring product safety and quality. Its versatility, nutritional benefits, and clean-label status make it an ideal ingredient for innovative food and beverage formulations catering to vegan, vegetarian, halal, and kosher markets.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Apple Pomace fine milled from Döhler GmbH is a beige, finely milled powder derived from the de-juiced fruit, specifically the pulp, skins, seeds, and stems remaining after apple juice extraction. This product contains no allergens or GMO ingredients and complies with European food law. It features a particle size of less than 0.2 mm for 90-100% of the product and has a maximum residual moisture of 10%. Nutritionally, it is rich in dietary fiber (61.4 g per 100 g), with moderate amounts of protein (5.5 g), fat (3.8 g), and carbohydrates (17.1 g), providing 247 kcal per 100 g. The product retains the natural apple odor and taste, making it suitable for enhancing flavor profiles. Apple Pomace fine milled offers significant functional benefits, including fiber enrichment, antioxidant properties from phenolic compounds, and improved texture in various food applications. It is widely used in bakery products, extruded snacks, meat products, confectionery, and beverages to boost nutritional value, improve sensory qualities, and support sustainability by reducing waste. PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Flat-leaf Parsley by Darégal is a premium dried herb product made from 100% flat-leaf parsley (Petroselinum sativum Hoffm.), carefully harvested at optimal maturity from selected soils and fields in France. The parsley undergoes thorough washing, drying, cutting, and packaging processes to ensure full traceability and maintain its authentic, natural taste and characteristic green color. Available in various cut sizes ranging from extra large to fine, this product offers versatility for culinary applications, including use in cold and hot dishes such as sauces, sautés, soups, and salads. Darégal's Flat-leaf Parsley is microbiologically guaranteed, ready to use, and economically advantageous compared to fresh parsley, with a long shelf life of up to four years when stored properly. Rich in natural compounds like apiole, β-phellandrene, flavonoids, and antioxidants including vitamins A, C, and K, it provides both flavor and nutritional benefits. Its antimicrobial properties also make it suitable as a natural preservative in food products. Packaged in eco-responsible kraft paper bags with polyethylene lining, it supports sustainable practices. This product is GMO-free, additive-free, and compliant with stringent European food safety and quality standards, making it ideal for vegan and vegetarian diets. Overall, Darégal's Flat-leaf Parsley is a versatile, high-quality herb that enhances flavor, color, and nutritional value in a wide range of culinary and food industry applications.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Freeze Dried Cranberry Powder 50mesh - 2x7.5 kg from Chaucer Foods Ltd is a finely ground powder made from cranberries that have been carefully cut, freeze-dried, and sieved to achieve a particle size of less than 50 mesh, with a minimum of 90% passing this size. The powder is characterized by a typical cranberry flavor and color, with natural variations possible between batches. It contains less than 5% moisture, ensuring stability and an extended shelf life of 18 months when stored in airtight packaging below 25°C away from heat and sunlight. Free from allergens and genetically modified ingredients, this product is suitable for vegetarian, vegan, kosher, and halal diets. Its versatile applications span beverages, baked goods, snacks, dairy and frozen desserts, sauces, dressings, and nutritional supplements, where it enhances flavor, color, and nutritional value. The freeze-drying process locks in the fruit's beneficial compounds, making this powder an excellent ingredient for health-conscious consumers seeking natural, functional food components.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: RSF-200 from RIKEN VITAMIN CO.,LTD. is a bread improver designed to enhance the quality and performance of wheat-based products. It is presented as a yellowish white powder with a slight characteristic odor, composed primarily of mono- and diglycerides of fatty acids (E 471), sodium stearoyl lactylate (E 481), starch, and enzymes. This formulation helps improve dough handling, texture, and volume of baked goods. RSF-200 meets international regulatory standards for food additives, including those set by FAO/WHO, EU, and US FDA, ensuring its safety and purity. It is recommended for use in wheat products at a dosage of 0.3 to 2.0% based on flour weight. The product is free from genetically modified organisms and is packaged in 20 kg paper bags with inner PE lining to maintain quality during storage. With a shelf life of 12 months under cool, shaded, and dry conditions, RSF-200 offers a reliable solution for bakers seeking to improve bread quality, consistency, and shelf life while complying with food safety regulations.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: GALACIN NISIN 101 NACL 2.5, also known as LACIN 101, is a natural antimicrobial powder produced by Galactic S.A. through the fermentation of Lactococcus lactis. This product contains nisin, a potent antimicrobial peptide, combined with 2.5% sodium chloride (NaCl) which acts as a stabilizer. It appears as a white to light brown powder with a pH range of 2.9 to 3.8 in a 10% solution and has a maximum loss on drying of 3.0% w/w. The active nisin content ranges between 2.5% and 3.0% w/w, with a potency of at least 1000 IU/mg, ensuring effective inhibition of Gram-positive spoilage and pathogenic bacteria. GALACIN NISIN 101 NACL 2.5 is heat-resistant, non-dairy, and non-GMO, making it suitable for a wide range of food applications including processed meats, dairy products, beverages, canned foods, seafood, and convenience foods. Its natural origin and clean label appeal align with modern consumer demands for safe, minimally processed foods. The product is GRAS certified, Halal and Kosher approved, and complies with European regulations, making it a versatile and reliable choice for enhancing food safety and extending shelf life across diverse food and beverage categories.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Rosemary Extract from Hunan Huacheng Biotech, Inc. is a fine brown yellow powder derived from the dried leaves of Rosmarinus officinalis L., sourced and manufactured in China. This 100% natural extract is rich in rosmarinic acid (not less than 5%) and contains carnosic acid (not more than 1%), extracted using water and ethanol solvents. It features a characteristic odor and taste, with 95% of the powder passing through an 80 mesh sieve, ensuring fine particle size. The product is rigorously tested for physical, chemical, and microbiological quality, including limits on heavy metals and microbial contamination, making it safe and reliable. Certified Kosher, Halal, and NON-GMO, this rosemary extract offers potent antioxidant and antimicrobial properties, making it ideal for use in food preservation, cosmetics, and pharmaceuticals. Its antioxidant compounds help inhibit lipid oxidation, extending shelf life and maintaining freshness in products such as meats, oils, and baked goods, while its antimicrobial activity prevents spoilage by inhibiting bacteria, yeasts, and molds. Additionally, it imparts a distinctive aromatic flavor, enhancing the sensory appeal of foods like marinades, sauces, and dressings. The extract is stable under high temperatures (190–240°C), suitable for baking and frying applications. Packaged in 25kg drums or cartons with protective inner bags, it has a shelf life of two years when stored in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Overall, this rosemary extract is a versatile, natural ingredient that supports clean-label product development and offers health-promoting benefits such as antioxidant support and potential anti-inflammatory effects.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: CURCUMIN NATURAL COLOUR from DÖHLER is a deep red viscous liquid natural colorant derived from turmeric, designed to provide vibrant yellow to orange hues in food and beverage applications. Composed primarily of ethanol (35%-45%) and glycerine (15%-22%), this product exhibits a typical flavor and aroma reminiscent of freshly dried turmeric root. It has a specific gravity ranging from 0.968 to 1.008 and a refractive index between 1.410 and 1.450 at 20°C, with a flash point of 26°C. The product is allergen-free, GMO-free, and kosher suitable, with a recommended color declaration of 100. CURCUMIN NATURAL COLOUR is stable under typical food processing heat conditions and is widely used in bakery, dairy, beverage, snack, and plant-based meat analog products to enhance color naturally while also offering antioxidant and anti-inflammatory benefits. It is approved for food use under relevant standards in Australia and New Zealand and should be stored in a cool, dry, well-ventilated place protected from light and heat at temperatures not exceeding 20°C. With a shelf life of 12 months, this natural colorant supports clean-label trends and meets consumer demand for natural, health-beneficial ingredients in diverse food and beverage formulations.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Cheddar Cheese Powder Hi Flavour from Ballantyne Foods Pty Ltd is an uncoloured, creamy white powder characterized by a strong, well-rounded cheddar cheese flavor profile that delivers rich savory and umami notes. This smooth, free-flowing powder contains cheese solids derived from pasteurised milk, salt, starter culture, and enzymes, along with milk solids, salt, and lactic acid as an acidity regulator. With a moisture content capped at 4.0% and salt around 5.5%, it ensures consistent quality and flavor intensity. The product is microbiologically safe, with stringent limits on total plate count, coliforms, and absence of pathogens like Salmonella and Listeria. Packaged in 20 kg polylined multiwall bags, it offers an 18-month shelf life when stored in a cool, dry place below 25°C. Cheddar Cheese Powder Hi Flavour is versatile and widely used in sauces, soups, snack coatings, convenience meals, biscuit fillings, and icings, enhancing flavor, texture, and convenience. Its powdered form provides cost-effective cheese flavoring without refrigeration needs, making it ideal for food manufacturers seeking authentic cheddar taste with extended shelf stability. Suitable for halal diets but not vegetarian due to possible animal rennet, this Australian-made product supports diverse culinary applications, including snacks, bakery items, ready-to-eat meals, and beverages, contributing to flavor enhancement, emulsification, and nutritional fortification in various food products.

PHOSKADENT® SF is a pharmaceutical-grade sodium fluoride product manufactured by BK Giulini GmbH, presented as a white powder with a high purity content of sodium fluoride ranging from 98.0 to 102.0%. It exhibits a pH value between 8.0 and 12.0 in a 1% aqueous solution, indicating its alkaline nature. The product is water-soluble and has a bulk density of approximately 1100 g/l. PHOSKADENT® SF is specifically designed for the fluoridation of oral care products, playing a crucial role in dental health by helping to prevent tooth decay. Its low levels of impurities, including arsenic (max. 3 ppm) and heavy metals as lead (max. 30 ppm), ensure safety and compliance with pharmaceutical standards. The product is supplied in 25 kg PE-lined paper bags, with other packaging options available upon request. For optimal preservation, it should be stored in a cool, dry place away from moisture. Users must adhere to safety measures outlined in the safety data sheet during handling and application to ensure occupational safety and environmental protection. Overall, PHOSKADENT® SF is a high-quality, reliable sodium fluoride source tailored for effective use in dental care formulations.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: CEAMTEX 1602 C is a high-quality sodium alginate powder produced by Compañía Española de Algas Marinas S.A. (CEAMSA). This product appears as a white to beige powder, composed entirely of sodium alginate (E-401), a natural hydrocolloid extracted from brown seaweeds. It is soluble in both cold and hot water but insoluble in vegetable oils, minerals, and organic solvents. CEAMTEX 1602 C is specifically developed for water-based applications and is widely used in the food and beverage industry due to its multifunctional properties. It acts as a gelling agent, forming gels in cold water and milk when combined with calcium sources, making it ideal for plant-based and dairy products. Additionally, it serves as a stabilizer and thickener, enhancing texture, consistency, and stability in emulsified products such as dairy beverages, sauces, and dressings. The product also functions as a film former, creating protective barriers that reduce water loss and protect food items like hot dog casings and fresh produce. CEAMTEX 1602 C is suitable for restructured foods, providing heat and freeze/thaw stability, and is effective in emulsions and warm-consumed foods, maintaining bite and flavor release. It complies with international purity standards and carries numerous labeling claims including allergen-free, vegan, gluten-free, non-GMO, and halal, making it suitable for diverse dietary needs. The product is supplied in polyethylene and paper bags, with a shelf life of 24 months when stored under recommended conditions. Overall, CEAMTEX 1602 C is a versatile, natural hydrocolloid ingredient that enhances food quality, texture, and stability across a broad range of applications.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: CHOLINACTIVE P30 IP, manufactured by Novastell, is a non-GMO deoiled lecithin product derived from soy, enriched to contain a minimum of 30% phosphatidylcholine. This product appears as a yellow to light brown powder, making it easy to incorporate into various formulations. It is certified IP by Food Chain ID, HALAL, and KOSHER, ensuring compliance with diverse regulatory and dietary standards. The product's composition includes significant levels of phosphatidylinositol, phosphatidylethanolamine, and phosphatidic acid, contributing to its functional properties. CHOLINACTIVE P30 IP serves primarily as an emulsifier (E322) and a food supplement, leveraging the emulsifying and health-supporting benefits of phosphatidylcholine. Its high purity and low levels of contaminants, including heavy metals and microbial counts, make it suitable for food industry applications. The product is recognized as a food additive under European regulation and is generally recognized as safe (GRAS) in the United States. Its applications include improving the texture and stability of food products, aiding in fat reduction, and potentially supporting cholesterol management. Packaged in polyethylene bags within cardboard boxes, CHOLINACTIVE P30 IP has a shelf life of 24 months when stored in a cool, dry place, ensuring product stability and quality over time.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: VANILLA EXTRACT 45% VOL from AROMATECH SAS is a high-quality liquid flavoring characterized by its brown color and distinctive vanilla aroma and taste. Composed primarily of ethyl alcohol food grade from organic farming and inverted sugar, this extract contains 45% volumic alcohol content, ensuring potent flavor delivery. It is microbiologically stable and free from genetically modified organisms, allergens, and restricted substances, making it suitable for vegetarian, vegan, and kosher diets. Designed exclusively for industrial use in the food and beverage sector, it complies with European regulations and offers a natural, clean-label alternative to artificial flavorings. Its versatility allows it to enhance a wide range of products, including beverages, confectionery, dairy, bakery items, and nutritional bars, by enriching flavor profiles, masking off-notes, and imparting a pleasant aroma. With a shelf life of 12 months and storage recommendations to maintain quality, this vanilla extract is a reliable ingredient for manufacturers seeking to elevate the sensory appeal of their products.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: PUREFLEX Chondroitin Sulfate Sodium USP, manufactured by TSI Group Ltd., is a high-quality, pharmaceutical-grade ingredient derived primarily from bovine sources, with no additives or preservatives. It appears as a creamy white powder with a low and characteristic odor, exhibiting a bulk density of not less than 0.5 g/mL and a finely controlled particle size distribution to ensure consistency and ease of use. This product meets stringent USP and Ph. Eur. standards for purity, including chondroitin sulfate content between 90.0% and 105.0%, low levels of heavy metals, and microbial limits, making it suitable for sensitive applications. PUREFLEX is recognized for its safety, having obtained self-affirmed Generally Recognized as Safe (GRAS) status for use in food and beverage products. It is widely used as a dietary supplement ingredient to support joint health by maintaining cartilage structure and function, potentially alleviating symptoms of osteoarthritis and improving joint mobility. The product's powder form offers versatility and long shelf life, facilitating its incorporation into various formulations such as functional foods, beverages, tablets, and capsules. Due to its hygroscopic nature, careful handling and storage in unopened containers under ambient conditions are recommended, with packaging available in 25 kg double poly-lined fiber drums. Overall, PUREFLEX Chondroitin Sulfate Sodium USP is a reliable, safe, and effective ingredient for promoting joint health in food and supplement applications.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Masala Tea Unsweetened from Haldin Pacific Semesta, PT is a finely crafted powder blend that combines multiple traditional natural spices and tea to create an aromatic and flavorful beverage base. This unsweetened masala tea powder features a warm, creamy, and slightly astringent taste profile with a brown color and a distinctive spicy, slightly floral aroma. It is designed to be soluble in water, making it ideal for beverage applications at an 11% solution level. The product is characterized by a pH range of 5.9 to 7.1 and a moisture content not exceeding 8%, ensuring quality and stability. Its composition includes carefully selected spices known for their digestive, anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, and immune-supporting properties, making it a health-conscious choice for consumers. Masala Tea Unsweetened is widely used in ready-to-drink beverages, instant tea premixes, food service, catering, and health and wellness settings, offering versatility and convenience without added sugars. The product is microbiologically safe, free from harmful pathogens, and complies with strict heavy metal limits, ensuring safety and quality. With a shelf life of 12 months when stored properly in a cool, dry place away from direct heat or light, this masala tea powder is an excellent ingredient for manufacturers seeking to create authentic, flavorful, and health-beneficial tea beverages and related products.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: GERMAN CHAMOMILE FL 4:1 DE PR605 from PLANTEX is a high-quality powdered extract derived from the flowers of Matricaria recutita L., commonly known as German chamomile. This product is prepared with a 4:1 ratio of plant material to final extract, using water as the extraction solvent and wheat maltodextrin as a carrier. The powder exhibits a beige to brown color and is designed for incorporation into various formulations, with solubility dependent on the degree of incorporation. Known for its distinctive sweet, floral, and honey-like flavor, this extract is widely used in the food and beverage industry, particularly in herbal teas, flavorings, and functional beverages aimed at promoting relaxation and digestive health. The extract contains key bioactive compounds such as apigenin 7-glucoside and alpha-bisabolol, which contribute to its calming and anti-inflammatory properties. It complies with stringent quality standards, including limits on heavy metals, pesticides, and microbial contamination, ensuring safety and efficacy. With a shelf life of 24 months when stored properly, GERMAN CHAMOMILE FL 4:1 DE PR605 is a versatile ingredient suitable for applications requiring natural flavor enhancement and potential health benefits related to stress relief and digestive support.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: GELLAN GUM from BLG is a high-quality hydrophilic polysaccharide produced through the fermentation of carbohydrates by Pseudomonas syringae. This off-white flowing powder exhibits excellent dispersibility and temperature resistance, capable of forming soft, elastic gels that serve as a thickener, stabilizer, and suspending agent all in one. Its unique molecular structure, consisting of a linear tetrasaccharide repeating unit, allows it to create gels with desirable texture and clarity. Gellan gum is widely used in neutral dairy beverages such as chocolate milk, cafe latte, and milk tea, as well as nutritional dairy drinks, where it enhances product stability and mouthfeel. It dissolves readily in water to form viscous solutions and passes rigorous quality tests including calcium and sodium ion gel tests, ensuring reliable performance. The product is suitable for UHT and HTST processing, with a recommended usage of 0.025%-0.035%. Its multifunctional properties also make it ideal for applications in sauces, dressings, confectionery, plant-based foods, and bakery products, where it improves texture, moisture retention, and shelf life. Packaged in food-grade PE bags within paper barrels, GELLAN GUM from BLG offers a shelf life of 24 months when stored unopened at room temperature, making it a versatile and dependable ingredient for food and beverage manufacturers seeking to enhance product quality and stability.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: CheeseMaker CF30 is a specialized modified potato starch product developed by KMC, designed specifically for the production of vegan cheese alternatives, particularly sliced cheese. This white powder, composed of acetylated distarch phosphate (E1414) and starch sodium octenyl succinate (E1450), offers a clean-label, non-GMO, and allergen-free solution that mimics the texture and meltability of traditional dairy cheese. Originating from Denmark, CheeseMaker CF30 is applied at a dosage of 19-21% and is notable for its ability to create elastic, sliceable, and customizable cheese-like products suitable for a variety of applications including snacks, sandwiches, salads, and pizza toppings. Its production adheres to stringent quality and safety standards, with ISO 22000 and BRC certifications, and it is available with halal and kosher certifications upon request. The product's low fat and protein content, combined with its high carbohydrate (starch) content, contribute to its functional properties in cheese analogues. Additionally, CheeseMaker CF30 supports cost-effective manufacturing of diverse cheese alternatives such as blocks, hard cheeses, white cheeses, grill cheeses, and cream cheeses, meeting the growing consumer demand for plant-based, allergen-free, and non-GMO food products.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: RP Maracaibo 65% is a premium special dark chocolate produced by Max. Felchlin A.G, originating from Switzerland. This chocolate is crafted from 53% shelled cocoa beans sourced from Venezuela, combined with sugar, cocoa butter, and Madagascar vanilla, resulting in a rich and intense cocoa flavor with a smooth texture. It is presented in a solid form, typically packaged in 1kg bags made of PE and paper materials, and should be stored under 18°C to maintain its quality. With a shelf life of 24 months, RP Maracaibo 65% is designed for professional use, especially customized for Akutagawa and imported by DKSH Japan. The product contains milk and almond allergens and may have traces of hazelnuts, making it important for users to consider allergy information. This chocolate excels in versatility, serving as an excellent ingredient for confectionery products such as chocolate bars, truffles, and pralines, as well as baked goods like cakes, pastries, cookies, and brownies. Its grated form facilitates easy melting, making it ideal for chocolate beverages, sauces, and spreads. Additionally, RP Maracaibo 65% is favored for tempering processes, decoration, and garnishing, ensuring a glossy finish and enhanced flavor in gourmet applications. Its high cocoa content and premium composition make it a preferred choice for creating luxurious chocolate experiences in both traditional and innovative culinary creations.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: FARINA PROTEICA DI NOCI BIOLOGICA from Parodi Nutra SRL is an organic walnut protein powder obtained through mechanical extraction technology that concentrates protein by removing oils without the use of solvents or chemicals. Derived from the Juglans Regia walnut variety, this powder features a light beige to dark brown color and retains the typical taste of raw walnuts. It boasts a high protein content (35-50%) and low fat content (6-13%), making it more stable against oxidation compared to traditional walnut flours. The product offers a complete amino acid profile and is rich in dietary fiber (12-19%), making it an excellent ingredient for enhancing the nutritional profile of various food products. Its powder form allows versatile applications in the food industry, including bakery products such as bread, pizza, biscuits, and energy bars, as well as in gluten-free formulations, coatings, snack bars, and plant-based beverages. Certified organic under EU regulations and kosher certified, it is free from pesticides, GMOs, and animal-derived ingredients, making it suitable for vegans, vegetarians, and halal diets. The product is microbiologically safe, with strict controls on contaminants and allergens, and has a shelf life of 18 months when stored properly. Its nutritional benefits, combined with its functional versatility, make FARINA PROTEICA DI NOCI BIOLOGICA a valuable ingredient for improving taste, texture, and healthfulness in a wide range of food applications.
